net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy

Class LeastConfidentSamplingQueryStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.querystrategy.AbstractQueryStrategy
      • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.AbstractSingleLabelQueryStrategy

          • net.sf.jclal.activelearning.singlelabel.querystrategy.LeastConfidentSamplingQueryStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IConfigure, IQueryStrategy, JCLAL

    public class LeastConfidentSamplingQueryStrategy
extends UncertaintySamplingQueryStrategy
    Implementation of Least Confident Strategy (Uncertainty Sampling) query strategy. An uncertainty sampling variant that queries the instance whose prediction is the least confident. Burr Settles. Active Learning Literature Survey. Computer Sciences Technical Report 1648, University ofWisconsinâ€“Madison. 2009.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Maria del Carmen Rodriguez Hernandez, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

        public double utilityInstance(weka.core.Instance instance)
        Description copied from interface: IQueryStrategy
        Test the instance according to the query strategy. Return the utility of the instance according to the query strategy
        Parameters:
